mts_check()

Check an mts object for validity.

mts_collapse()

Collapse an mts object into a single time series

mts_combine()

Combine multiple mts objects

mts_distance()

Calculate distances from mts locations to a location of interest

mts_distinct()

Retain only distinct data records in mts$data

mts_extractData() mts_extractMeta()

Extract dataframes from mts objects

mts_filterData()

General purpose data filtering for mts objects

mts_filterDate()

Date filtering for mts objects

mts_filterDatetime()

Datetime filtering for mts objects

mts_filterMeta()

General purpose metadata filtering for mts objects

mts_isEmpty()

Test for an empty mts object

mts_isValid()

Test mts object for correct structure

mts_select()

Subset and reorder time series within an mts object

mts_trimDate()

Trim a mts object to full days

requiredMetaNames

Required columns for the 'meta' dataframe

Convert a SingleTimeSeries object to a tidy dataframe

sts_trimDate()

Trim a SingleTimeSeries object to full days
